extensions.name: demo-calculator
extensions.title: Calculator Extension
extensions.description: A simple calculator extension for basic arithmetic operations. Supports addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division with keyboard shortcuts.
extensions.author: Demo Team

extensions.name: demo-weather
extensions.title: Weather Widget
extensions.description: Display current weather information and forecasts. Get real-time weather data for any city worldwide with beautiful UI components.
extensions.author: Weather Team

extensions.name: demo-notes
extensions.title: Quick Notes
extensions.description: Take quick notes and organize your thoughts. Features markdown support, search functionality, and cloud sync capabilities.
extensions.author: Notes Team

extensions.name: demo-timer
extensions.title: Pomodoro Timer
extensions.description: Boost your productivity with the Pomodoro Technique. Set work and break intervals, track your sessions, and stay focused.
extensions.author: Productivity Team

extensions.name: demo-clipboard
extensions.title: Clipboard Manager
extensions.description: Advanced clipboard manager with history, search, and formatting options. Never lose your copied content again.
extensions.author: Tools Team
